snippet: Bill O’Brien, the team’s new football coach, is among the Nittany Lions coaches who are taking part in an 18-stop bus tour, which will come to Manhattan on Wednesday night.
lead_paragraph: Bill O’Brien, the team’s new football coach, is among the Nittany Lions coaches who are taking part in an 18-stop bus tour, which will come to Manhattan on Wednesday night.

headline.seo: Penn State Coaches Hit the Road to Meet Supporters
headline.main: Penn State Coaches Hit the Road to Meet Supporters
headline.print_headline: Penn State Coaches Hit the Road to Meet Supporters
